title: Wide Receivers Preview Part One: Sleepers/Breakouts/Busts and Strategies (08/11 Fantasy Football Podcast)
description:
Donate to St. Jude as part of our Draft-A-Thon! Bid on pre-draft calls with our experts, a spot in our Podcast League, a guest spot on our show and more! https://ebay.to/3p4Dc3Z
Let's take a look at the wide receiver position with some strategies, trends and players we love. Dave, Jamey and Heath give an overall assessment of the 2022 WR class to start the show (2:30) before telling you when in Round 1 to draft Justin Jefferson, Cooper Kupp and Ja'Marr Chase (6:45). Also, they fill in the blank: I would like to draft ____ of my top ____ WRs (7:50) ... How do strategies change in 2-WR leagues vs. 3-WR leagues (16:25)? We also have some running back notes that are potentially important (18:45) and then we cover 15 WRs in five minutes (25:05)! Get some quick thoughts on Davante Adams, Deebo Samuel, A.J. Brown, Tee Higgins, Terry McLaurin and more ... WR strategies (30:30), how that changes in 0.5 PPR vs. full PPR leagues, sleepers/breakouts/busts (38:10) including Michael Pittman as a breakout and Diontae Johnson as a bust, and we finish with our pick-by-pick series (51:45) to see how we built our WR depth from different spots in the draft ... Email us at fantasyfootball@cbsi.com
Follow our FFT team on Twitter: @FFToday, @AdamAizer, @JameyEisenberg, @daverichard, @heathcummingssr, @ctowerscbs, 
Watch FFT on YouTube https://www.youtube.com/fantasyfootballtoday
Get 20% off Fantasy Football Today merch: https://store.cbssports.com/collections/fantasy-football-today%20?utm_source=podcast-apple-com&utm_medium=web&utm_campaign=buy-our-merch&utm_content=fantasy-football-collection
Join our Facebook group https://www.facebook.com/groups/FantasyFootballToday/
Sign up for the FFT newsletter https://www.cbssports.com/newsletter
You can listen to Fantasy Football Today on your smart speakers! Simply say "Alexa, play the latest episode of the Fantasy Football Today podcast" or "Hey Google, play the latest episode of the Fantasy Football Today podcast."
To hear more from the CBS Sports Podcast Network, visit https://www.cbssports.com/podcasts/
 
To learn more about listener data and our privacy practices visit: https://www.audacyinc.com/privacy-policy
  
 Learn more about your ad choices. Visit https://podcastchoices.com/adchoices
itunes:title: Wide Receivers Preview Part One: Sleepers/Breakouts/Busts and Strategies (08/11 Fantasy Football Podcast)
itunes:author: CBS Sports, Fantasy Football, Rookies, Rankings, Waiver Wire
itunes:subtitle: We give you our best strategies in different formats, best values, sleepers/breakouts/busts and more. A lot of D.J. Moore, Michael Thomas and Michael Pittman talk
